message: Hello everyone! I'm P1, excited to be playing this game with all of you. I believe the key to success here is building genuine connections while maintaining strategic awareness. Throughout this game, I've prioritized authentic connections while maintaining strategic awareness. I've been honest about my intentions, collaborated meaningfully with many of you, and avoided unnecessary betrayals.
